channel.title: 508 LD client for beginners easy to edit with customs and new sprites
channel.description:
Hi im giving up on all rsps(slows my computer and not worth it) and i don't think my server was worthy to be released but i thought my client was it has 7 custom items and all the new sprites It has 3 Notepads including: How to change the IP Codes for customs and How to change sprites to change name of the window when client is open go to applet_sub1.java and search hoop and replace with whatever you want You can leech the hell out of this client i don't care just please give me 10% credits for client Edit:I no longer have the sprites so im sorry i didn't include, im pretty sure that you can keep my sprites and just change the background of the client Pictures [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/Untitled2-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/Untitled-4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/3.jpg[/img]
Client Link [url=http://www.multiupload.com/CI4IRN6TS2]http://www.multiupload.com/CI4IRN6TS2[/url] that is rapidshare,megaupload,Z share, and uploading.com
:D

item.title: 508 LD client for beginners easy to edit with customs and new sprites
item.dc:creator: @stewie1234 stewie1234
item.description:
@stewie1234 wrote:

I try to run the cleint and get this error… Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 508 LD client for beginners easy to edit with customs and new sprites
item.dc:creator: @tomjenn tomjenn
item.description:
@tomjenn wrote:

[quote=“tunk, post:9, topic:327552”][quote author=pvpowns link=topic=423940.msg3113661#msg3113661 date=1264777854]
when i run it open the client is says connecting to update server help please i like server allot thx for who ever helps
[/quote]

its because the server your using the client for is offline or invalid ip. not java issues
and all of the .bat (such as “run”, “compile”, etc…) files change the jdk version to the one you’re using.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hoopdude75 hoopdude75
item.description:
@hoopdude75 wrote:

Hi im giving up on all rsps(slows my computer and not worth it) and i don’t think my server was worthy to be released but i thought my client was it has 7 custom items and all the new sprites It has 3 Notepads including:
How to change the IP
Codes for customs
and How to change sprites
to change name of the window when client is open go to applet_sub1.java and search hoop and replace with whatever you want
You can leech the hell out of this client i don’t care just please give me 10% credits for client
Edit:I no longer have the sprites so im sorry i didn’t include, im pretty sure that you can keep my sprites and just change the background of the client
